content: Hello! This is XYZ Home Services. I understand you need help with your HVAC system. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Mike! Can you please provide your address so I can check if we're able to service your location?
Thank you, Mike. We can service your area. When would be the ideal time for our technician to visit you?
Honestly, I'm really busy this month and don't think I can fit any appointment in right now.
I understand, Mike. If it helps, I can notify you when we have openings next month, or assist you with any questions you might have in the meantime.
Thanks, but I think I'll just hold off for now and reach out when I have more time.
reason: Customer too busy this month to schedule
